meaningMnemonic: If you visit a <radical>bar</radical> after a <radical>tsunami</radical>, you’ll be hanging out in <kanji>shallow</kanji> water. After a tsunami, you want to relax with a drink at the bar. Unfortunately, tsunamis cause floods, and the bar floor is immersed in shallow water.
readingMnemonic: What beer are you drinking at this bar while standing in <kanji>shallow</kanji> water? You’re drinking <reading>Asa</reading>hi (あさ), the beer of the salaryman. Asahi is super dry, so it takes your attention away from the shallow water a bit.
